title: Experimental Instructional Design Course Based on Mobile Microlearning for Computer Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and administrative work experience
context.additional_context: Intermediate professional learners in managerial/leadership roles completing computer education courses using mobile devices. Emphasis on real-world application skills through experiment-centered pedagogy.

learning_goals: Learners can write three or more task automation scripts applying foundational computer science concepts in a mobile environment.
Learners can design and present two or more improved digital solutions through peer evaluation and feedback.
Learners can develop one computer-based strategy to solve real-world workplace problems through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
